AirBnb Cloneweb app

ReactJS

GitHub Repo Live version

Build the front page of application to mimic AirBnb. This was the first project in basic ReactJS and it uses Custom Components which passes data from a vanilla javascript file as Props and uses .Map to iterate over the data created a list of <Card/> components. The homepage utilizes Flexbox for the layout. It was built as one of the group projects of Scrimba's Frontend Developer Career Path.

When I took my first job at teleflora I had just learned some basics to angular which was using components but I hadn't got the hang of it. Once I started ReactJS what I really loved was JSX. It makes reading what you are trying to do so much easier than saving DOM elements in variables and then running the methods.

rawledjuglal@gmail.com
